name: Nepali Keyboard
description: Nepali Keyboard lets you type in English characters which gets instantly converted to Nepali.  Typing with this Nepali keyboard is the fastest way to type - you dont need any other Nepali input tools. It works inside all applications on your phone - no more copy-paste! Supports 21+ colorful themes with easy settings, this is the trendiest way to type Nepali letters on Android, and the easiest Nepali typing keyboard!  Chat with your friends and family in your native language - use native Nepali text on any chatting or social media apps on your phone like a regular keyboard.  How to start Nepali typing using this Nepali Keyboard:  1. Open Nepali Keyboard from your apps after installing 2. Enable and choose Nepali Keyboard as your default keyboard. 3. Customize settings and choose from 21 amazing themes 4. Start typing Nepali language everywhere!  Start typing in English and choose Nepali word suggestions for what youre typing. Offline support coming soon. Works on Android phones and Android tablets. Simple to use with touch screen Nepali text typing from phonetic transliteration using this keyboard.  - Nepali keypad, Nepali layout and Nepali mobile keyboard in all your applications - Easy swith to English or Nepali text as you need. Turn off Nepali when you dont need by using the language button. - Emojis are supported: hold on the 123 number button and youll get a list of smileys. There are 3 pages from which you can choose what you need from the Nepali smiley keyboard.. - Color themes can be changed from the settings page. Look for Nepali keyboard in your apps to access this.  No more typing with slow manual keyboards - this is the best Android Nepali Transliteration Keyboard that is free, fast, effortless and easy to use.  No personal information or credit card details are collected. We store anonymous statistics may be shared to improve your experience - share your suggestions at apps@clusterdev.com  Please leave great feedback - it helps us keep going!
